text.no-account-please-select: You did not select an account yet, Please select one.
text.no-internet: The web is different for you. Not connected to the Internet, please check the network status.
text.no-account-please-create: You do not have an account yet, please create one.
text.r-u-sure-to-del-acc: Are you sure you want to delete this account? The operation is irreversible.
text.r-u-sure-to-del-pro: Are you sure you want to delete this profile? The operation is irreversible.
text.error-in-auth: An error occurred while verifying the account. Please check whether your username or password and the authentication server are normal.
text.no-profile-please-create: You do not have an profile yet, please create one.
text.description-of-profile-directory: It is usually the "minecraft" folder under macOS and Linux, and ".minecraft" under Windows
text.password-required: Please enter the password of your current account
text.help-on-error: If the problem is an Epherome error or you cannot solve the problem, you can contact the Epherome developer
text.alpha-warn: There may be many bugs in the alpha version, please report bugs in time.
text.edit-in-settings: You can modify it in the settings at any time.
